1.Pros: I would highly recommend this job to any high schooler or college student looking for part time work! The salary is decent and the hours are flexible.
1.Cons: You will get sick of the food after you work at McDonald's for a long time! I am not sure why, but now I cannot stand the smell of the place after working in the kitchen.

2.Pros: Great Part-time job for High school students, flexible hours.

3.Pros: Great Food, Great People to work with
3.Cons: High employee turnover and difficult to work around other's schedules

4.Pros: I was with Friends and built a good strong relationship with the customers, and I learned a lot of good values to work with others.
4.Cons: I had very little time to do what I wanted and I was not making no profit for myself working there. I hardly had enough money to put in the gas tank.

5.Pros: Good Hours, Cares about employees, Tuition Help
